title: Social pressure
comment: Could this app lead people to feel under pressure to use it? Could it maybe even become something of a status symbol?

title: Improved health service?
comment: With sleep being regulated this could lead to less accidents and injuries due to tiredness and therefore be less of a burden on a nation's healthcare system allowing Doctors and nurses to focus on more chronic conditions patients may have.

title: Economic opportunities
comment: Would employers prefer people with this app? Would it enable people to work harder for longer? If so, where does this leave those without it?

title: Improved mental health
comment: Just as improved sleep may improve mental health i wonder if this app could could anxiety about not having it and how people may be perceived and therefore actually contribute to poorer mental health too?

title: Side effects?
comment: Is it possible there could be unforeseen side effects to using this app in the longer term or for extended periods of time?

title: Can it be relied upon?
comment: Who is responsible for trialing this before it gets used? Is it efficient? Are there any potential long term side effects of using this app?

title: Sleep Aid
comment: This could be massively important for people who struggle to get enough sleep and could have positive mental health benefits.

title: Using an app as a way of controlling sleep
